We are open Monday-Friday 8am-5pm EST, USA. NOTE: Sometimes our system emails get caught in SPAM.¬† Please contact us if you are expecting a quote or other email and have not received it. Easily update your priorities and goals as they change throughout your project and keep your team members on the same page. Built for Your Business Any of our personnel whiteboards can be customized for your specific business needs. Send us a sketch of your whiteboard design and we‚Äôll help you make a unique whiteboard for your business. Start your free trial Book a Demo Resource Scheduler Plan and Assign Tasks with Ease Simple Task Planning : Assign tasks based on team availability and capacity. Real-Time Updates: Changes sync automatically across your monday.com boards. Avoid Overload: Track team workloads to prevent overburdening anyone. Clear Overview: See tasks on a visual timeline to spot potential issues early. Try for free ‚Üí Working Capacity & Holiday Calendar Manage Workloads and Time Off with Ease Track Capacity: Easily see how much work each team member can handle. Plan for Time Off : Keep track of holidays, vacation days, and time off to avoid scheduling conflicts. Leave Requests : Track and approve team members‚Äô time off requests in one place. Balance Workloads: Adjust tasks based on team availability to ensure no one is overloaded. Try for free ‚Üí Time Tracking & Timesheets Effortlessly Track Time and Manage Timesheets Simple Time Tracking : Log time spent on tasks directly in the app. Timesheet Management : Review and approve timesheets with a few clicks. Easy Reports: Generate reports to see where time is being spent and optimize your workflow. Try for free ‚Üí Calendar View Get a Clear Overview of Tasks and Deadlines View Tasks & Deadlines : See all your tasks and deadlines in one calendar. Customizable Views: Switch between daily, weekly, or yearly views to fit your needs. Track Holidays: Easily manage team holidays and ensure proper planning. Stay Organized: Keep track of all upcoming work and prevent scheduling conflicts. Try for free ‚Üí Recurring Tasks Automate Repetitive Tasks and Save Time Set Up Once, Automate Forever : Create tasks that automatically repeat on your preferred schedule. Flexible Scheduling: Choose from daily, weekly, or custom intervals. Stay Organized: Keep recurring tasks organized and ensure nothing gets missed. Save Time: Eliminate the need to manually recreate tasks over and over again. Try for free ‚Üí Manage Multiple Boards in Dashboard & Reports Track Multiple Boards in One Unified Dashboard Unified Dashboard : Monitor all your projects and teams in one place. Custom Reports: Create interactive reports to track performance, progress, and resource usage. Cross-Board Management: Easily manage tasks and resources from multiple boards within a single dashboard. Real-Time Updates: Get live insights into your team‚Äôs performance and project timelines. Try for free ‚Üí Get Started with TeamBoard for monday.com Getting Started is Simple Start using TeamBoard in just a few clicks. Install the app from the monday.com marketplace, explore its intuitive features like the Resource Scheduler, Calendar View, and Timesheets, and see how it transforms your workflow. Need help? Book a free demo and let us guide you through everything your team needs to get started quickly and effectively. Access the Quick Start Guide ‚Üí Integrate with monday.com Integrates seamlessly with monday.com environments and offers a centralized platform for managing tasks, projects, and resources effectively. Try for free Project management Project management empowers managers to oversee their projects effectively. Try for free Workload Management It involves the process of efficiently distributing and managing work across your team members. Try for free Time Tracking Time Tracking lets managers monitor hours spent on tasks accurately. Close About Us The Juice Bar Juice Company is a family owned & operated business that specializes in 100% Fresh & Natural Cold Pressed Juice. Our mission is to provide a healthy, affordable high quality alternative to the sugary juice options provided in most fast food chains & grocery stores. Our juices are 100% natural with no added sugars, water, or preservatives. The Juice Bar Juice Company is a health & wellness brand dedicated to improving the lives of our community with nature‚Äôs medicine: Fresh fruit & vegetable juice! Before you go! About Us  |  The Cocktail Club Our Story From the Basement to The World The Cocktail Club didn‚Äôt become one of London‚Äôs most prestigious bar experiences overnight. In fact, our story started way back in 2008, when childhood friends JJ Goodman and James ‚ÄúHoppy‚Äù Hopkins, with nothing more than a small loan from JJ‚Äôs mum, Lizzie, decided to change the London bar scene. Armed with a world-class drinks menu, years of cocktail expertise, and a passion for nightlife artistry, they came together to open the Covent Garden Cocktail Club. From that moment onwards, a little local site with a lot of heart soon blossomed into one of London‚Äôs most booming bars. Aided by their victory on the 2009 UK television program, The Restaurant, which featured Raymond Blanc and Dragons‚Äô Den‚Äôs Sarah Willingham, The Cocktail Club began to revolutionise the London cocktail scene. Since that first site, TCC has exploded outwards, winning a range of national awards from London Lifestyle, Time Out, Design My Night, and more. What started with a speakeasy-style basement has now become London‚Äôs most sought-after party experience. 13 years and 17 new sites later, The Cocktail Club brings the very best of British Bars to your night out. We party harder, we go for longer, we do it better. Every. Single. Time. Founder JJ Goodman A globally recognized personality and thought-leader in the world of mixed drinks, JJ Goodman is the Founder and Owner of The Cocktail Club bar group. Infatuated with bartending from a young age, JJ had firmly established himself as an innovator in the drinks industry before opening his first bar at the age of 24 in 2008. Since then, he has opened an additional 10 cocktail bars across London, pioneered revolutionary cocktail trends around the world, and is seen as one of the globe‚Äôs greatest drinks minds due to his many accolades. Achievements & Recognition Among JJ‚Äôs achievements, highlights include winning the 42 Below Cocktail World Cup, becoming one of London Lifestyle Award‚Äôs 50 Most Influential People and one of Zagat‚Äôs 30 Under 30 Trailblazers. JJ also won BBC Two‚Äôs The Restaurant in 2008, which consequently secured him a business partnership with Dragons‚Äô Den‚Äôs Sarah Willingham and chef personality Raymond Blanc OBE. This win catapulted JJ‚Äôs career into the limelight, and he is now recognized as the leading celebrity bartender. Recent television credits include Alan Carr: Chatty Man, Let‚Äôs Do Lunch with Gino and Mel, The Alan Titchmarsh Show and Saturday Kitchen. JJ has also recently partnered with multiple global brands and is currently an ambassador for the likes of Sainsbury‚Äôs, Marks & Spencer, Lidl, Red Bull, Eurostar, & Marriott. Other notable media credits include features in The Daily Mail, Wall Street Journal, Evening Standard, Metro, The Sunday Times and Bar Magazine. After partnering with The Prince‚Äôs Trust, Springboard UK, and the British Institute of Innkeeping (BII), JJ is now focused on education and developing a community of resources within the hospitality industry. His vision is to open doors within hospitality for Britain‚Äôs unemployed youth and, in collaboration with the industry‚Äôs leading companies, to create the first government accredited qualification in specialized cocktail bartending. 020 7580 1960 Quick Links About FAQs & Contact Us Safer Together Join The Team Offers Gift Cards Blog Free Cocktail Christmas 2025 More Information Terms & Conditions Cookie Policy Privacy Policy ¬© Copyright 2025 The Cocktail Club . All rights reserved. Operated by Powered by Happy Hour Events & Bottomless Brunch Menus Offers Occasions Christmas 2025 Our Bars Book Now

Juicy Cocktail Bar | Scrunchy Scrunchy Explore Restaurants For Diners For Restaurants Toggle theme Toggle theme Explore Restaurants For Diners For Restaurants Juicy Cocktail Bar $$ ‚Ä¢ Bar Location & Contact 202 S Olive Ave, West Palm Beach, FL 33401 Email: josh@juicywpb.com Website The Infatuation's Review The Infatuation's Review Categories Bar Cocktail Bar About Make a reservation at Juicy Cocktail Bar, where tropical flavors meet cocktail excellence in the heart of West Palm Beach, Florida. This intimate 22-seat bar is renowned for its innovative cocktails that showcase the best of South Florida's vibrant fruit scene. Signature drinks like Tony‚Äôs masala margarita, featuring sweet potato and turmeric, and the refreshing mandarin cream crush are must-tries for any cocktail enthusiast. The laid-back ambiance, paired with upbeat tunes, creates a fun and inviting atmosphere perfect for a night out with friends or a romantic date. Diners especially love the unique experience of enjoying seasonal fruit plates alongside their drinks, making it a delightful culinary adventure. Juicy Cocktail Bar is not just about great drinks; it‚Äôs a place where the bartenders engage with guests, ensuring a personalized experience. With a focus on authenticity and creativity, this bar is a standout in the local scene. Don't miss out on their rotating specials, including the popular blackberry shaved ice cocktail. Whether you're a local or visiting from Miami, securing a reservation is highly recommended to experience the best cocktails in town. Make a Reservation at Juicy Cocktail Bar Fill out the form below and we'll check availability for your group Full Name Email Group Size Date Pick a date Time Select time Location Types of Dining Establishment Select establishments Cuisines Select cuisines Specialties Select specialties Budget per Person Select budget range Dining Room Preference Select dining room preference Preferred Atmosphere Select atmosphere preference Type of Event Select event type Dietary Restrictions (Optional) Special Requests (Optional) Additional Information (Optional) Submit Reservation Request

In our shop we have everything you need to set up your cocktail bar according to your wishes and quality. Our organization is a distinguished name in manufacturing and exporting Bar Products , Kitchenware, Hotel-ware and Copper products etc. "NJ Overseas Pvt. Ltd. " is run under the supervision of "Mr. JP SINGH". Set up in the year 2013, we have successfully manufactured the quality products using modern machinery. The clients trust our products for their quality. Our products range takes you to the most important things; work utensils and tools for bartenders. Here you will find all the essential bar utensils to prepare a great drink, from quality cocktail shakers to knives, bar muddlers or ice crushers. Our large selection is versatile and, with our many years of experience in the field of bar equipment, is also characterized by the our manufacturing process.
